title: Goldy's Kitchen Cookbook: Cooking, Writing, Family, Life
description:
Goldy's Kitchen Cookbook: Cooking, Writing, Family, Life

English | 2015 | ISBN: 0062194046 | 352 pages | EPUB | 0,7 MB


The beloved New York Times bestselling culinary mystery writer delivers a cookbook packed with more than 160 mouthwatering recipes and charming anecdotes about her writing and cooking life.

Diane Mott Davidson is the author of seventeen bestselling mysteries featuring caterer/sleuth Goldy Schulz, a woman who â€œtook the lemon that life had given her and made not just lemonade but Lemon Chicken, Lemon Bars, Lemon Cookies and Lemon Meringue Pie.â€ Each Goldy novel includes recipes for scrumptious dishes from the adored characterâ€™s kitchen. Now, Davidson has collected these treasured recipes and some brand-new dishes in one volume for the first time
